intro.title: Practice Chain Analysis
intro.description: Chain Analysis helps you understand patterns in challenging situations by breaking them down into clear components. Use these exercises to practice identifying vulnerability factors, triggers, and intervention points.

tip.title: Tip:
tip.content: Start with a recent situation that wasn't too intense. As you get comfortable with the process, you can analyze more challenging experiences.

exercises.title: Guided Chained Analysis
exercises.description: Step-by-step guided analysis of a challenging behavioral situation

reminder.title: Remember
reminder.content: Chain Analysis isn't about blaming yourselfâ€”it's about understanding patterns with compassion so you can make different choices next time.
